text: nope, HubSpot does not retry failed request for you. If a request fails, you would have to handle the retry in your code. Are you seeing anything specific I can look into, or more of a general curiosity?
hi there, I am looking for someone to help me with the integration
I had it post on workana but i had no luck

Hey everyone, I hope everyone is staying healthy. I am having an issue with a property, and it had worked prior but now its not, so I'm hoping for opinions on what it could be or assistance with a workaround. the problem currently is I created a contact property {{ contact.myview }} in the contact profile this is set as a single line text with a specific domain. on the cms side, i have a button with {{ contact.myview }} as the link. it worked for a while now it is not. and I have no clue why, the only variable ist we upgraded to enterprise last week.
Can you please help me HubSpot CMS Developers practical side, if you have any video regarding coding side so kindly share me .

topic: General HubSpot developer discussion, collaboration and fun. :rotating_light:Not an official HubSpot support channel :rotating_light: For urgent issues, plz contact HubSpot Support. For less urgent issues, please post in <http://bit.ly/HubSpotdevform>
text: set the channel topic: General HubSpot developer discussion, collaboration and fun. :rotating_light:Not an official HubSpot support channel :rotating_light: For urgent issues, plz contact HubSpot Support. For less urgent issues, please post in <http://bit.ly/HubSpotdevform>

I'm seeing 502 failures but resources are still being created. I've reached out on the Dev forums on HubSpot. Hopefully will be able to get a clear answer about this if it's really an issue on HubSpot's side of things.

We are retrying as well in case of failures. We've seen multiple resources created without any errors seen on our end, presumably because the retries were working. The only thing that I can see at the moment that would cause these resources being created is if HubSpot were to have still created those records..
When you are logged in and viewing the website there is a black menu, click it and check developer info and see what `myview` gets you
